title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Grounded in Literacy Learning Differences and Qualitative Research

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary pedagogy theories and literacy concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze major types of adolescent literacy learning differences through qualitative research case studies.
Learners can design instructional strategies that reinterpret learner differences as positive resources rather than deficits.
Learners can conduct formative assessments using literacy assessment tools (e.g., digital portfolios) suitable for mobile microlearning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
